item.title: Monitoring Overview | KubeVault
item.description: New to KubeVault? Please start here. Monitoring Vault Server Vault operator has native support for monitoring via Prometheus. You can use builtin Prometheus scrapper or CoreOS Prometheus Operator to monitor Vault operator. This tutorial will show you how this monitoring works with Vault operator and how to enable them. Overview By default the Vault operator will configure each vault pod to publish statsd metrics. The Vault operator runs a statsd-exporter container as sidecar to convert and expose those metrics in the format for Prometheus.
